about_the_game:
Feast your human ears on the pleasing sounds of Automachef!

Includes 20 tracks by Fredrik Drønen

    • A Moustache to Woo the Ladies
    • All Strings Attached
    • An Office with a View
    • Automachef's Menu
    • Bustling Boulevard
    • Extravagant Residences
    • How Dinner is Made
    • Leisure Pleasure
    • Maytime Blossoms
    • Music While You Work
    • Restoration Relaxation
    • Rush Hour Rag
    • Strolling in the Park
    • Sunday at the Air Show
    • Swinging Patties
    • Teeming Terminal
    • The Vacation
    • Winner Winner Diner Diner
    • You Lose, Sir
    • 祝賀我的人類朋友! (Congratulations to my Human Friend!)
detailed_description:
Feast your human ears on the pleasing sounds of Automachef!

Includes 20 tracks by Fredrik Drønen

    • A Moustache to Woo the Ladies
    • All Strings Attached
    • An Office with a View
    • Automachef's Menu
    • Bustling Boulevard
    • Extravagant Residences
    • How Dinner is Made
    • Leisure Pleasure
    • Maytime Blossoms
    • Music While You Work
    • Restoration Relaxation
    • Rush Hour Rag
    • Strolling in the Park
    • Sunday at the Air Show
    • Swinging Patties
    • Teeming Terminal
    • The Vacation
    • Winner Winner Diner Diner
    • You Lose, Sir
    • 祝賀我的人類朋友! (Congratulations to my Human Friend!)

name: Automachef Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD A8-5600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti or Radeon HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Feast your human ears on the pleasing sounds of Automachef!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
